title: World
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: New British passport to feature king’s coat of arms and enhanced security

items.title: France targets Australia-style social media ban for children next year
items.description: Draft bill to be submitted for legal checks as France aims to follow Australia’s world-first ban on platforms including Facebook, Snapchat and YouTube...

items.title: Finnish police seize vessel suspected of damaging underwater cable
items.description: Border guards say they found ship with anchor lowered into sea after detection of fault in Helsinki-Tallinn telecoms link Finnish police have seized a...

items.title: ITV agrees to invest £3m in fitness app created by Joe Wicks
items.description: The Body Coach app, launched during Covid lockdowns, will advertise on ITV’s channels and video platform ITVX as part of finalised deal The broadcaste...

items.title: €1m Picasso portrait up for grabs for €100 in charity auction
items.description: Artwork by one of the most influential artists of 20th century raffled to fund Alzheimer’s research His work is consistently ranked among the world’s ...

items.title: Watch: Stunning celestial events that lit up the skies in 2025
items.description: From meteor showers to supermoons, here are some of the sights that wowed stargazers this year.

items.title: EU's top diplomat rejects Russian claims of Ukrainian attack on government sites
items.description: It comes as Russia releases video which it claims shows a downed Ukrainian drone launched at one of Putin's residences.

items.title: Sydney sends message of peace for New Year's after Bondi terror attack
items.description: The words peace and unity were projected onto the Sydney Harbour Bridge as thousands gathered to watch the annual fireworks.

items.title: Bottled water from Waitrose recalled over risk it contains glass
items.description: The food safety watchdog said people should return affected Deeside water bottles to stores.

items.title: Passenger describes 'chaos' after head-on Machu Picchu train collision
items.description: Tourist Niels Honkoop says shattered glass littered the carriage floor and injured people were lying in the aisles.
